Title: Nurture talented people for reconstruction in an appropriate way,
Designer: Art Work Office of the Cultural Bureau of Jiangsu Provincial People's Government (江苏省人民政府文化局美术工作室)
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社)
Notes: The fifth poster of a series of 11, published in January 1954. Although the series sets out elements of the General Line, it is more reflecting policies of the First Five Year Plan. The slogans underneath the individual posters make up consecutive sentences.
Theme: Early Campaigns (1949-1954)Early Industrialization (1950-1955)First Five Year Plan (1953-1957)
